items.title: Why Casio Just Launched an AI-Powered Emotional Support Guinea Pig
items.description: The robot is called Moflin. It costs $429— and it’s adorable.

items.title: 3 Things Keeping Employers Up at Night
items.description: Company leaders across the U.S. are worried about how the economic and political climate is impacting workers.

items.title: Meta Will Soon Personalize Ads Based on What Users Type Into Its AI Tools
items.description: The AI-based changes include Facebook and Instagram and will go into effect in December.

items.title: OpenAI Just Hit a $500 Billion Valuation After Selling Shares to SoftBank: Report
items.description: OpenAI employees sold shares in a deal that saw the company’s valuation grow from $300 billion in a matter of weeks.

items.title: Why it Might Pay to Be ‘Playful’ at Work
items.description: Play isn’t just for kids — a study shows how the trait can build rapport with colleagues.
